name: Eating with a Dog Simulator
description:
Eating with Dog Simulator offers the IMMERSIVE and INTERACTIVE experience of trying to eat food while your dog watches. 

CUSTOMISE  your dog's name

OVER one ENDINGS

HIGH QUALITY GRAPHICS based on your imagination

MULTIPLE SNACKS to try and stop your dog from eating

ENDLESS GUILT and FRUSTRATION as your dog is ADORABLE and HUNGRY

🐾 EXPERIENCE CUPBOARD LOVE 🐾

🐶🐾
